source.title: Tailwind Plus Overview: UI Components, Blocks and Templates
source.description: Tailwind Plus has three core offerings: Catalyst UI kit for React component systems, 500+ UI Blocks in React/Vue/HTML formats, and Next.js templates. including framework compatibility FAQs.

source.title: Getting started - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Catalyst UI kit setup covering Tailwind CSS v4.0 requirements, component installation, dependencies (Headless UI, Motion, clsx), client-side router integration for Next.js, Remix, Inertia, Inter font, and Heroicons.

source.title: Sidebar layout - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Catalyst SidebarLayout component covering sidebar and navbar props, component composition with Header, Body, Footer sections, responsive patterns, Dropdown menus, Avatar components, Heroicons integration, and overscroll background configuration.

source.title: Stacked layout - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Catalyst StackedLayout component covering navbar and sidebar props, desktop navigation with NavbarSection and NavbarDivider, mobile sidebar menu, responsive patterns using max-lg:hidden classes, Dropdown menus, Avatar components, and overscroll background configuration.

source.title: Auth layout - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Catalyst AuthLayout component for centered authentication pages covering login, registration, and password reset forms with Field, Input, Button, Checkbox, Select components, grid layout patterns, and form composition examples.

source.title: Alert - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Alert component built on Headless UI Dialog with subcomponents AlertTitle, AlertDescription, AlertBody, AlertActions, configurable size prop, open state management, onClose handler, auto-focus support, and examples for confirmations and forms.

source.title: Avatar - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Avatar component API with sizing utilities, initials prop for fallbacks, square prop, avatar groups with overlapping styles, AvatarButton component for interactive elements, and href prop for link integration.

source.title: Badge - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Catalyst Badge and BadgeButton components covering color prop with 18 variants, using badges as interactive buttons, link functionality with href prop, and comprehensive color reference for light and dark modes.

source.title: Button - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Button component API covering props (type, color, outline, plain, disabled, href), style variants (solid, outline, plain), color options (adaptive and 20 solid colours), disabled states, icon integration, and link usage.

source.title: Checkbox - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Checkbox component API including props (color, disabled, name, value, checked, onChange), CheckboxField and CheckboxGroup wrappers, usage with labels and descriptions, indeterminate state, controlled/uncontrolled patterns, fieldsets, and colour variants.

source.title: Combobox - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Combobox component API with props for disabled state, validation, positioning, filtering, controlled/uncontrolled values, examples including labels, descriptions, placeholders, avatars, flags, secondary text, and custom filtering.

source.title: Navbar - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Navbar component with NavbarItem, NavbarSection, NavbarSpacer, NavbarDivider subcomponents. Patterns include logos, active states, icon links, dropdowns, avatar menus, mobile responsiveness, and StackedLayout integration for mobile navigation.

source.title: Sidebar - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Sidebar component structure including SidebarHeader, SidebarBody, SidebarFooter, SidebarSection, SidebarItem with icons, labels, active states, dropdowns, dividers, spacers, headings, and component API documentation.

source.title: Description list - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Description list component using DescriptionList, DescriptionTerm, and DescriptionDetails to display term-value pairs with optional headings, extending JSX dl, dt, and dd elements respectively.

source.title: Dialog - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Dialog component built on Headless UI with subcomponents DialogTitle, DialogDescription, DialogBody, DialogActions, controlled open and onClose props, configurable size options, auto-focus behaviour, scrolling support, and dropdown integration patterns.

source.title: Divider - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Horizontal divider component extending HTML hr element with soft prop for reduced contrast, utility class support for spacing control, basic usage examples, and API documentation.

source.title: Dropdown - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Dropdown components including DropdownButton, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem with styling options, menu placement, sections, dividers, icons, keyboard shortcuts, descriptions, headers, disabled states, custom triggers, and menu width customisation.

source.title: Fieldset - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Fieldset component for grouping form controls with Legend, FieldGroup, Field, Label, Description subcomponents, supporting disabled state, grid layouts, custom layouts, and accessibility features including aria-label attributes.

source.title: Heading - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Heading and Subheading components for Catalyst UI Kit, including component API, basic usage examples, custom level prop for semantic HTML elements whilst maintaining visual styles, and integration patterns.

source.title: Input - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Input component with Field/Label integration, InputGroup for icons, validation errors via ErrorMessage, supported types (email, password, url, date), disabled states, controlled components, and custom Headless UI layouts.

source.title: Pagination - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Pagination components including container, previous/next navigation, page lists, page links, gap indicators, current page states, disabled links, aria-label customisation, and patterns for rendering with or without numbered links.

source.title: Radio - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: RadioGroup component with RadioField, Radio, Label, and Description components, including controlled and uncontrolled state, color variants, disabled states, custom layouts, accessibility features, integration with Fieldset components.

source.title: Select - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Select component API props (disabled, invalid, name, value, onChange), examples including basic usage, with label, description, disabled state, validation errors, width constraints, custom layouts, controlled components.

source.title: Switch - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Switch component API including SwitchField and SwitchGroup, color variants, controlled and uncontrolled states, labels, descriptions, custom layouts, disabled states, and fieldset integration with Headless UI accessibility.

source.title: Table - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Table component API including core components (Table, TableHead, TableBody, TableRow, TableHeader, TableCell), props (bleed, dense, grid, striped), responsive layouts, clickable rows, styling variants, integration with pagination and dropdowns, dialog usage.

source.title: Text - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Text component for paragraph styling with TextLink for inline links, Strong for emphasis, Code for inline code symbols, responsive design with dark mode support, and component API specifications.

source.title: Textarea - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Textarea component API including props (disabled, invalid, resizable, name, value, onChange), usage with Field/Label/Description components, disabled state, validation errors, custom layouts, and controlled component patterns.

source.title: Listbox - Catalyst UI Kit for Tailwind CSS
source.description: Listbox component API with props, examples including placeholders, avatars, icons, flags, secondary text, labels, descriptions, disabled and validation states, custom layouts, width constraints, controlled usage.

source.title: Tailwind Plus - Official Tailwind UI Components & Templates
source.description: Setup guide for Tailwind Plus components including Tailwind CSS v4.1 requirements, Inter font integration, dark mode configuration, and navigation to framework implementations (HTML, React, Vue) and interactive elements.

source.title: Tailwind Plus - Official Tailwind UI Components & Templates
source.description: React implementation guide covering Headless UI and Heroicons dependencies, React 18+ requirements, component creation patterns, code adaptation strategies, and refactoring examples for creating reusable component structures.

source.title: Tailwind CSS Tabs - Official Tailwind UI Components
source.description: Tab navigation UI components including underline tabs, pill tabs, full-width tabs, bar tabs with badges, icons, brand colours, gray backgrounds, and dark mode variants for tabbed content.

source.title: Tailwind CSS Navbars - Official Tailwind UI Components
source.description: Navbar components featuring simple designs, dark variants, menu buttons, search bars, quick action buttons, centered search layouts, secondary navigation links, column layouts, and responsive mobile patterns.
